metadata.title_en: Global Female Formal Wear & Bridal Dress AI Attribute Taxonomy v1.0
metadata.title_zh: 全球女性礼服与婚纱AI属性标准体系 v1.0
metadata.description_en: The world's most comprehensive AI-ready attribute taxonomy for female formal wear and bridal dresses, powering next-generation AI applications in fashion, e-commerce, and design.
metadata.description_zh: 全球最全面的女性礼服与婚纱AI就绪属性分类体系，为时尚、电商和设计领域的下一代AI应用提供动力。
metadata.ai_powered_by: AIBigBuy.com - Leading AI Solutions for Fashion & E-commerce

ai_capabilities.image_annotation: Advanced AI image recognition and labeling for wedding dresses and formal wear
ai_capabilities.product_generation: AI-powered design generation and style recommendation systems
ai_capabilities.cost_calculation: Intelligent pricing and cost estimation based on material and design complexity
ai_capabilities.style_classification: Deep learning-based style analysis and trend prediction
ai_capabilities.recommendation_systems: Personalized styling and product recommendation engines
ai_capabilities.virtual_try_on: AI-powered virtual fitting and styling simulation
ai_capabilities.trend_analysis: Real-time fashion trend analysis and market insights

market_coverage.global_reach: Worldwide coverage of bridal and formal wear markets
market_coverage.occasions: Weddings, galas, proms, ceremonies, and special events

copyright.author: AIBigBuy Team
copyright.attribution: Powered by AIBigBuy's advanced AI technology and comprehensive fashion industry expertise
data_sources: International fashion industry standards and design guidelines
Cultural wedding dress traditions and ceremonial attire worldwide
AI training datasets and machine learning model requirements
Professional fashion designers and industry experts consultation
Global fashion trend analysis and market research data
AIBigBuy proprietary fashion AI research and development

ai_technology.deep_learning: Neural network-based feature extraction and classification

categories.description_en: Primary and secondary fabrics used in wedding and formal gowns
categories.description_zh: 婚纱与礼服所用主要和次要面料
上身剪裁，肩部设计与支撑结构

categories.description_zh: 礼服后背设计，开合类型
内衬、支撑结构及塑形层
拉链、纽扣、绑带、紧身背心等

categories.description_zh: 珠片、亮片、刺绣、贴花、水晶、羽毛等装饰

categories.description_zh: 面料表面图案，包括刺绣、印花、蕾丝花纹

categories.description_zh: 肩带类型，可拆卸支撑或内置胸垫选项

categories.description_zh: 礼服主色与辅色，考虑文化差异

categories.description_zh: 面纱、腰带、披肩、手套、头饰等
